700542f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Pelham Parkway South
700542f-a.folder: Boston Road & Pelham Parkway South, Bronx, NY

700543f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Pelham Parkway South
700543f-a.text:
Boston Road (trolley tracks thereon), north from Pelham Parkway
South to White Plains Road. Also shown is the Pelham Parkway station
and part of the elevated trestle of the I.R.T. White Plains Road subway
line on the latter thoroughfare. The station straddles the entire
breadth of the Bronx and Pelham Parkway. White Plains Road runs directly
north, whereas Boston Road proceeds in a northeasterly direction.
1917.
James Suydam.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
